<<<<<<< HEAD
The one thing necessary Preached in a sermon at Pauls, before the Right Honourable the Lord Mayor, and the aldermen of the City of London, Aug. 31. 1656. By Thomas Watson, minister of Stephens Walbrook, London. Watson, Thomas, d. 1686.
The second edition.
[8], 72 p.
printed by E.M. for Ralph Smith, at the Bible in Cornhil, neer the Royal Exchange; and Thomas Parkhurst, at the three Crowns at the lower end of Cheap-side against the Conduit, London : 1658.
Copy tightly bound with slight loss of print; some print show-through. Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
=======
